AbstractSensor<TYPE> - Class in org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors
Master abstract base class for sensors, implements AutoCloseable in order to be usable as try-with-resource structure

AbstractStackSensor<TYPE> - Class in org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack
Manual abstract base class for sensors extends AbstractStackSensor adding capacity to stack metric names automatically This means that the final sensor name will be the accumulation of the previous open sensors in the same thread separated by dot (.)
AbstractStackSensor(MeasureReducer<TYPE>, Optional<MetricsService>, String, Object...) - Constructor for class org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.sensors.stack.AbstractStackSensor
Abstract sensor constructor with the given parameters the sensor name will be the accumulation of the previous open sensors in the same thread separated by dot (.)

secureApply(T, T, BiFunction<T, T, T>) - Static method in enum org.bytemechanics.metrics.crawler.internal.MeasureReducers
Applies to the given function the two given values but never applies if any of them is null if _val1 and _val2 are null: return Empty optional if _val1 or _val2 are null: return an optional of the not null value if _val1 and _val2 are not null: return Optional of _function.apply(_val1,_val2)
